originalText.text:
Monetta greeted us warmly, took us on a tour, explained everything we needed to know, and guided is to make a successful booking. Perfect service!

A second round of excellent service, this time Joe helping us out on a rainy Sunday figure out how to transfer to a more economical unit. He was very pleasant and have us great advice.

A second round of excellent service, this time Joe helping us out on a rainy Sunday figure out how to transfer to a more economical unit. He was very pleasant and have us great advice.

originalText.text: Wanted to rent two units to store some old furniture that I was replacing but didn’t want to throw away. Cyrus was super helpful and accommodating in getting me set up - taking the time to find unit sizes that could fit my couch and ending up with two very convenient locations. Great service

originalText.text: I highly recommend Bryan for his excellent service in renting me a storage space. He was prompt, professional, and made the process seamless. The storage unit was clean and secure, meeting all my needs. Great experience overall!

text.text: I highly recommend Bryan for his excellent service in renting me a storage space. He was prompt, professional, and made the process seamless. The storage unit was clean and secure, meeting all my needs. Great experience overall!

originalText.text:
I received very helpful support from phone agent Essence. She was kind, courteous, and went above and beyond. Really great work.
Thanks!

I received very helpful support from phone agent Essence. She was kind, courteous, and went above and beyond. Really great work.
Thanks!

originalText.text:
This complaint goes to management.  My privacy was invaded and personal property destroyed with no notice.
In September 2023, I made arrangements to move my items to a slightly smaller unit and this worked out well.  It was a smooth transaction. Seven weeks later, I return to place things in storage only to be shocked that my storage unit is no longer there. Mind you, I went to the front desk first to confirm my access code and was not prepared for what I was to discover.   Manhattan Mini Storage broke my personal pad lock, threw it away, had my personal belongings moved to another smaller unit and did not attempt to contact me or obtain my consent to do what they did.  The handling of my personal property was poorly managed. A box I had marked as fragile had items on top. A leather headboard had the bed metal frame leaning against it and left a deep indentation.  I complained to the assistant manager who said customers were contacted, which is not true.  I was not contacted. There was no email, call, or postings.    I expect courtesy as a paying customer that I be given proper notice and the option to move my own items or decide what to do with my things during their renovations.   If they had informed me in September that the area I was in was going to be renovated and my items would need to be relocated, I would have selected a different unit.  Manhattan Mini Storage didn’t do right.  This was poorly managed.  There was no attempt to communicate with me before, during, or after the fact. I was in shock when I couldn’t find my storage unit. Shocked by such an invasion of privacy and handling of my personal belongings. They could have handled this differently and with tact. They could have sent an email, called, posted notices in the building and on each floor to alert customers who may be impacted by the planned renovations. For poor management and lack of care and regard for customers’ right to know beforehand, I rate this facility and management a 1-star.
